examples: he didn't want to make a fuss

definitions.text: something or someone that causes trouble; a source of unhappiness
examples: washing dishes was a nuisance before we got a dish washer
he's not a friend, he's an infliction

definitions.text: take the trouble to do something; concern oneself
examples: He did not trouble to call his mother on her birthday

definitions.text: cause annoyance in; disturb, especially by minor irritations
examples: Mosquitoes buzzing in my ear really bothers me
It irritates me that she never closes the door after she leaves

definitions.text: to cause inconvenience or discomfort to

examples: Don't bother the professor while she is grading term papers
The mere thought of her bothered him and made his heart beat faster

definitions.text: make confused or perplexed or puzzled
